biz.femtosoft.fractal.domain
Class FractalCompressor

java.lang.Object
  biz.femtosoft.fractal.domain.FractalCompressor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class FractalCompressor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Compresses the images: it finds the FractalCodes that best characterize the destination image. This implements the simplest compressor, detailed in Chapter 3 of Ning Lu's book.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ken DeLong

setPanelSize

public void setPanelSize(int pPanelSize)

getPercentDone

public double getPercentDone()
Returns the percent of destination regions matched. Not synchronized so that we can monitor progress of the compression.
